data.name: Looterkings - ProGamer Pack
data.detailed_description: This is the Looterkings-Skin package called ironically "ProGamer-Pack", as it is a reference to three german Youtubers (Gronkh, Sarazar, SgtRumpel) who are not exactly known to be the best players. Also, they are the partners of Looterkings GmbH, the game-dev behind Looterkings. This skin-Packs are meant as a goodie for the community, presented as a cost-free DLC.
data.about_the_game: This is the Looterkings-Skin package called ironically "ProGamer-Pack", as it is a reference to three german Youtubers (Gronkh, Sarazar, SgtRumpel) who are not exactly known to be the best players. Also, they are the partners of Looterkings GmbH, the game-dev behind Looterkings. This skin-Packs are meant as a goodie for the community, presented as a cost-free DLC.
data.short_description: This is the Looterkings-Skin package called ironically "ProGamer-Pack", as it is a reference to three german Youtubers (Gronkh, Sarazar, SgtRumpel) who are not exactly known to be the best players. Also, they are the partners of Looterkings GmbH, the game-dev behind Looterkings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2,5 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 with 2 GB Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 with 2+ GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
